Blog.post: glah yesturday soccer was fun... when we played lao pta... we almost lost... and if we lost it wouldve been just really really funny... and it was 1 to 2.... and we were losing.. and only a minute left in the game... we brought the ball up.... and 30 seconds left.. I MADE IT IN! WOOP.... but we lost to gay ass lan xiong... ugh... anyways we got 2nd place.. but ya... i got sun burned.. for the first time in my life.. lol and im playing neopets right now.. and holy shit... huge glitch in it hope i didn't lose anything
ahh my sister went to the neighbors about an hour and half ago.. and shes still over there! ahHH! what if she isn't@
woop! neopets is starting to get fun for some reason :-D if you haven't signed up for it... SIGN UP urlLink click here to sign up

i forgot to write that i saw my english teacher mr orth at cub foods yesturday... lol he works there... i bet all teachers have 2 jobs because teachers dont get paid enough.. anyways i didn't say hi to him so i know he's going to say something about that next year -_-

today i went to walmart with my dad around midnight.. well my dad says my mom threw away all his pajama stuff... and shorts... well he said he'll buy one there.. and i felt bad.. because he buys me and my sister all this good stuff and he buys himself crappy stuff... i felt so sad when i saw him do that.. even thinking about that makes me tear... and when we were walking... he looked at this cd case.. and i knew he would buy it for me.. because i dont really take good care of my cds... and like... well i was sad -_- so im like cmon.. im getting tired.. >.

bored as hell now.. nothing really to do.. hey guess what though.. i found the cd for my camera thing.. whew im glad i didnt lose it.. or else my dad would be really pist off right now... hehe o and guess what.. we got new couches! woop woop! there purdiful and comfy... hehe... glah.. but anyways... it was really hot out today.. very hot... nothing really to do.. -_-
what would you say love means?

i just finished watching series 1-10 :D woop! i think theres one more.. its like a drama kind of thing.. but its really funny and romantic at times... its about this girl.. who matures throughout the whole series... each series is like an hour and half long :D
soooo bored... its summer.. nothing to do.. grr... im going to be on the computer 24/7 probably.. im on neopets.. glah... transfering pets and stuff so we could get the avs.. glah. nothing to do...!

I dont get why my parents have to be so damn different. Its summer break now.. no school... you can stay up late.. sleep in.. and your parents dont even care... Well atleast mine dont. But why the hell won't my parents let me go out alot.. argh.. they even got me a valleyfair pass.. so that means going out alot.. to go to the park.. oh and everytime i ask... they go.. go talk to your mom.. than you go back to your mom and your mom says go talk to your dad..than by the time you have to go.. you cant go.. that really pisses me off... gawsh and you know most parents wouldn't mind sending their child out to hang out with friends... gawsh and teenagers at the age of 14 now want to start going out alot... what will parents do when they turn 16.. HELLO? drivers licence? they'll be going out more than lots of people. how will they stop em? gawsh... pisses me off!
